scripts.test: npm run compile && npm run test-automatic-instrumentation && docker-compose up -d && jest --silent; docker-compose stop
scripts.test-ci: npm run compile && npm run test-automatic-instrumentation && jest --silent --config jest.ci.config.json --coverage && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js
scripts.release-minor: npm install; npm run build; release-it minor -n --npm.publish --src.commit --src.tag --src.push --src.tagName='v%s' --github.release --no-requireCleanWorkingDir --no-requireUpstream
scripts.release-minor-without-tag: npm install; npm run build; release-it minor -n --npm.publish --no-requireCleanWorkingDir --no-requireUpstream --no-src.commit --no-src.tag --no-src.push --no-src.push --no-src.tagName='v%s' --no-github.release
scripts.release: npm install; npm run build; release-it -n --npm.publish --src.commit --src.tag --src.push --no-src.push --src.tagName='v%s' --github.release --no-requireCleanWorkingDir --no-requireUpstream
scripts.release-without-tag: npm install; npm run build; release-it -n --npm.publish --no-requireCleanWorkingDir --no-requireUpstream --no-src.commit --no-src.tag --no-src.push --no-src.push --no-src.tagName='v%s' --no-github.release
